definition: temporarily/for the time being
surname Quan
authority/power/right/(literary) to weigh/expedient/temporary

sentences.english: Call it the crisis of whiteness.
Perhaps then the imagination would no longer be accused of wielding the power of substitution alone.
sentences.chinese: 可能他们因此不再控诉想像只是权且充当代理。
